titleStmt.title: Government described: viz. what monarchie, aristocracie, oligarchie, and democracie, is. Together with a brief model of the government of the common-wealth, or, free-state of Ragouse. Fit for view at this present juncture of settlement. By J.S.
titleStmt.author: Streater, John, fl. 1650-1670.

notesStmt.note: The words "monarchie, .. democracie," are bracketed together on title page.
Identified on UMI microfilm (Early English books, 1641-1700) reel 1770 as Wing (2nd ed.) S63.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts), and the Bodleian Library (Early English books, 1641-1700).
